title: News: Wilco stream The Whole Love in its entirety tomorrow
content:
I feel spoiled.

In my last post about Wilco, I was bubbling over with excitement at the notion of forthcoming album The Whole Love being released on September 26th, and getting all broody over a one and a half minute video. Clearly, the band are aware of their fans’ enthusiasm, since they’ve announced via their newsletter that as ‘a reward for your labors, ours, and those of our forefathers/mothers’, they’re going to be streaming The Whole Love on wilcoworld.net for a 24 hour period as of 12 noon tomorrow, Central Time. So that’s what…6pm our time? It’ll definitely be worth…being there.

Sorry.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d3c
